name: Woody Allen Movie Characters Quiz | People Themed | 10 Questions

questions.explanation:
Sleeper.

	This 1973 stars Woody Allen as Miles Monroe who goes into the hospital for a routine operation and wakes up in the distant future.  Co-starring Diane Keaton in her 2nd Woody Allen film.

options: Everything You Always Wanted to Know About Sex
questions.explanation:
Stardust Memories.

	Woody Allen stars in this somewhat autobiographical 1980 movie as a film director who no longer wants to make comedy films.

Bananas.

	This 1971 movie stars Woody Allen as Fielding Mellish as a consumer products tester who becomes the new President of a small country.

Manhattan Murder Mystery.

	Woody Allen reunited with Diane Keaton in this 1993 comedy about a married couple who tried to solve the murder of their neighbor.

Manhattan.

	Woody Allen stars as Ike Davis in this 1979 movie as a television writer who quits his job to write a novel.  Also co-starring Meryl Streep and Mariel Hemingway.

options: The Curse of the Jade Scorpion
questions.explanation:
Scenes From a Mall.

	Woody Allen stars as Nick Fifer in this 1991 movie who decides on  his 16th wedding anniversary to confess to his wife (played by Bette Midler) about his extra marital affairs.

Take the Money and Run.

	Woody Allen stars as Virgil Starkwell in this 1969 movie as an incompetent petty thief in this hilarious comedy.

Love and Death.

	Woody Allen stars as Boris Grushenko in this 1975 movie as a coward Russian who is enlisted to save his country.  Diane Keaton plays his wife, who is plotting to kill Napoleon.

questions.correct: The Curse of the Jade Scorpion
questions.explanation:
The Curse of the Jade Scorpion.

	Woody Allen stars as CW Briggs in this 2001 movie about an insurance investigator who is hypnotized into becoming a jewel thief.

Annie Hall.

	Woody Allen plays Alvy Singer in this 1977 movie as a neurotic New York comedian and his relationship with his girlfriend Annie Hall (played by Diane Keaton).
